title: As Amtrak's Train Cars Age, Ridership Skew Young
teaser: The number this week is 750,000. That's how many passengers travel Amtrak's Northeast Corridor daily. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with data expert Mona Chalabi about facts and figures of rail travel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
